snippet: Gilberto Valle’s supervisor was asked on the witness stand about his job description, his access to equipment, his routine and even his meal preferences.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column; supervisor for Gilberto Valle, former New York City police officer accused of having plotted to kidnap, cook and eat women, is asked on the witness stand about his job description, access to equipment his routine, and even his meal preferences.
lead_paragraph: Gilberto Valle’s supervisor was asked on the witness stand about his job description, his access to equipment, his routine and even his meal preferences.

headline.main: Testimony Outlines Workday of Officer Accused of Grisly Plot
headline.print_headline: Testimony Outlines Workday Of Officer Accused of Grisly Plot
